CamEmm27.First Lines:
Anne god þov schalt wrschippeHis name naȝt suerie an
                    ydelschupe…
CamEmm27.Last Lines:
…Ne after þy neȝbores wif ne longeNe oþer
                    mannes þing to hawe mid wronge
CamEmm27.Note: Added to lower margin by hand responsible for 4402 in this MS.
